summary:
Experienced Paediatrician with interest in Clinical Research, Genomic Medicine, Medical Education and Neonatal Intensive Care Unit (NICU). Strong healthcare services professional with a Certificate in Leadership & Management from University of Cambridge. Completed PG Certificate in Medical Education from University of Befordshire and educational roles with RCPCH. Also completed a PG Certificate in Genomic Medicine from Imperial College, London.

https://www.researchgate.net/profile/Nikhil_Ganjoo

ingestedContentSummary.description: ‎eConceptual : Conceptual Orthopedics, Conceptual Surgery, Conceptual Anesthesia & Conceptual Radiology eConceptual is world's first application for clinical & surgical online training to Medical Post-Graduates MS / MD/ DNB / DO / DMRD Resident...
ingestedContentSummary.fullText: eConceptual : Conceptual Orthopedics, Conceptual Surgery, Conceptual Anesthesia & Conceptual Radiology eConceptual is world's first application for clinical & surgical online training to Medical Post-Graduates MS / MD/ DNB / DO / DMRD Resident Doctors, budding Surgeons, Clinicians & Practitioners Dr. Apurv Mehra, leading Orthopedic Surgeon & renowned National & International Faculty of Orthopedics dreamt to create this unique App with a vision to build a learning platform where the biggest legends from the Best Medical Institutes would join hands and provide to all medical Post-Graduates, residents and practitioners - the best clinical & surgical training, required skill sets, latest techniques, procedures and updated knowledge to excel in their residency with the help of innovative teaching methods taught by expert faculty, and cutting-edge resources to create a truly immersive learning experience. eConceptual App is a platform that hosts Conceptual Orthopedics – World’s No 1 Online Training App for Ortho Post-Graduates, residents and practitioners. Conceptual Surgery – World’s No 1 Online Training App for Surgery Post-Graduates, residents and practitioners. Conceptual Anesthesia - World’s No 1 Online Training App for Anesthesia, Post-Graduates, residents and practitioners. Conceptual Radiology - At Conceptual Radiology, learn the skills of tomorrow. Onlline Platform for MD / DNB / DMRD Radio Residents & Budding Radiologists. The aim behind eConceptual is to provide standard training to MS/ DNB Resident Doctors enthusiastic to understand clinical & surgical skills right from THE BASICS, building strong concepts and keeping them abreast with the recent advances. To provide you with the best training, the biggest legends, leading clinicians & surgeons with excellent academic background have come together to share the most valuable assets - their knowledge, experience and achievements earned over years of dedicated Clinical and Surgical practice. Distinguished educators like Prof. Dr. S.M. Tuli, Prof. Dr. Sudhir Kumar, Prof. Dr. Anil Dhal , Prof. Dr. Shantharam Shetty, Prof. Dr. V.B. Bhasin, Prof. Dr. Arun Kakar, Prof. Dr. R C M Kaza, Prof Dr. Vinod Malik, Prof Dr. Satish Aggarwal, Prof. Dr. Rakesh Garg, Dr. Geeta Kadayaprath, Dr. Jignesh Gandhi, Dr. Vivek Bindal, Dr. Raju Easwaran Dr. Jhanvi Bajaj, Dr. Zainab Vora and many more leading clinicians and surgeons have come together on one single platform to create content that is coherent, current and clear i.e. conceptual - as the aim is not to live forever but to leave behind a legacy that lives forever Through the App, we have tried to create "A National Classroom" for dissemination of knowledge to every student desirous of getting it with no limits on the number of students and no selection criteria. Our trainees can learn from the best teachers in the world on everyday basis through their cell phones anytime & anywhere as per their convenience. Using Latest Technologies, eConceptual App provides: - Video Lectures on Clinical Examination and Demonstration - In-App Notes - Question Bank to practice MCQs - Regular In-App Live Sessions - Mentorship Sessions - Books authored by eConceptual Faculty - Live MCQ Discussions eConceptual will enable you to: - Have access to the best medical educational learning application content anytime, anywhere! - Gather step by step simulations of surgeries, procedures & techniques performed by the Legends. - Get the best case notes for theory exams - HD online video lectures - Important case discussion by the legends - Free download with purchasable educational packs available. To Be The Best, Come & Learn From The Best - Anytime & Anywhere At eConceptual : Conceptual Orthopedics, Conceptual Surgery, Conceptual Anesthesia & Conceptual Radiology. World's No.1 Platform for Medical Post-graduates, Residents, Budding Clinicians & Practitioners eConceptual – The Learning Never Ends

message.text:
https://lnkd.in/eaZXaaRE

Welcome to "Conceptual OBG", your comprehensive companion tailored specifically for residents in Obstetrics and Gynecology. This innovative app serves as your ultimate one-stop solution, designed to meet all your residency needs effortlessly.

Featuring a vast library of lectures, our app ensures you have access to the latest insights and knowledge in the field, empowering you to stay up-to-date with advancements and best practices. Whether you're preparing for exams or simply seeking to expand your understanding, our curated collection has you covered.

Welcome to a new era of residency medical education!

Raina Chawla
Wishing everyone a Happy Holi… our Indian celebration of colour 🌈
So happy and proud of our team, NICU at Peterborough was the runner up in the East of England Perinatal awards!!! #nwaft #pch #nicu
Celebrating our children with a diagnosis of Down syndrome and their amazing families ❤️
Proud of be part of this fabulous team… every single member is dedicated to the care of the small and vulnerable little ones 🥰

Our Neonatal Intensive Care Unit (NICU), received our Outstanding CREWS award meaning they've embraced and surpassed the values of Caring, Responsive, Effective, Well-led and Safe for our patients! 👌

We love the opportunity to recognise excellent care for our patients and their families! 😁💙
#TeamNWAngliiaFT

commentary.text: Keep rocking! The doorway to a hospital and first port of connect with a sick patient!
Lovely to see Dr Yogen Singh in your photos too.

Thank you, Very helpful to share this information. Genomic/genetic testing has revolutionised at predicting about the future and helps knowing prognosis to an extent. It is a balance and centralised advice and upcoming guidance from #BAPM is coming too. Key is to work with families and specialised centres to provide best outcomes!
Dr. Hafsa Haroon thanks for helping with cover 🙏🏼
